name: Prototype: Die on clock
description:
Hello, 

Darkest room presents their new prototype: Die on clock. 

In this escape-game there are only two exits: get out or die. With every step you will get closer to freedom or the grave. 

Good luck...

If you want to help us, thank you to complete the survey after your test: https://forms.gle/zBaoSpYU9djwBfEJ9
